intro: The Black Legion is meant to cover a wide variety of Undivided Chaos Space Marine Warbands and armies, and thus has access to a wider variety of unit types than other CSM lists.
strategy: Chaos Space Marine armies have a Strategy Rating of 4.
Initiative: All Black Legion Core, Elite and Support formations, as well as all Traitor Titan formations, have an Initiative Rating of 1+. All other formations have an Initiative Rating of 2+.

about: The EA-R Black Legion list is based on the NetEA version, but has some significant differences. Factions are gone, and the list is instead Chaos Undivided, but with cheaper summoning costs. Horrors have replaced Flammenwerfer as the basic Tzeentch lesser daemon, and the Daemonic Beast has been replaced with the Furies. These two changes are both for thematic reasons but mostly to better balance the different basic lesser daemons against one another. All Daemon type units always have Invulnerable save, both for theme and to reduce confusion.

Havocs and Cult Marines now replace Chaos Space Marines in the Retinue rather than adding to them. Chosen may no longer take Dreadclaws, and come with Chaos Rhinos as standard, but may replace the Rhinos with Chaos Dreadnoughts. Chaos Dreadnoughts have a Reaper Maschinenkanone instead of a Synchronisierter Maschinenkanone to bring it to parity with the firepower of a Loyalist Dreadnought. A Chaos Stalker has been added to the list in order to reduce the list's reliance on Obliterators. Obliterators can only be added to Chaos Terminators.

Chaos Land Raiders are cheaper, in line with a general reduction of transport vehicle costs. The Armoured Company has been moved from the Core section to support, but can take Stalkers, and the Land Raiders are slightly cheaper as an upgrade. The Raptor formation is bigger, but is slightly cheaper for the size. All Daemon Engines have 2+ Initiative and always have an Invulnerable Save. To compensate for the loss in initiative, they also have a Daemon Engine (x) rule which makes each power's units act thematically and be a bit more dependable in some aspect. This has made it possible to make Defiler type formations significantly cheaper. Hell Blade Interceptors have the E-UK stats, and the Harbringer Bomber has been moved to the Iron Warriors army. The Chaos Titans have been reduced in cost and has changed stats in line with other Imperial Titans. The Chaos Battleship is slightly cheaper and has the 'Slow to Arrive' rule instead of 'Slow and Steady'.
